name: Kidnapper
otherNightReminder: Revive the Kidnapper's previous victim. Wake the Kidnapper and show them their token. They point to a player; add the 'Kidnapped' token on that player and shroud them.
ability: Each night* you may choose a player; they die. They are revived the next night and regain their ability like it was their first night (even if you are dead). Executed players wont be revived.
